snippet.title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn | New Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Delve into new explosive Gameplay from Flintlock: The siege of Dawn, made by independent studio A44 Games, creators of Ashen. 

Get a fresh look at the powerful duo of protagonist Nor Vanek and her mysterious companion Enki as they use brand-new magical and tactical abilities and encounter vicious new foes in the area of Wanderer’s Rest. 

Stay tuned for an Extended Gameplay Reveal next month!
